title: Continuous Lag or Fps drop ever since New Summoners Rift [Game] or [Client]?
body:
Hey everyone

Just abandoned a game because I grew sick and tired of 1 second delays or lags where I couldn't move, minions freaked out, or my champion went in wrong direction or my spell was delayed so i missed it. This has happened to me randomly but usually during a fight in each game but in every game I have some lag issue. I never had this before the new summoners rift and my internet connection has not changed so what is causing this issue and if anyone has an idea on how to solve it please advise me. On the other hand if there are others having lag issues ever since the updated summoners rift add your thoughts as well and lets get this problem some notice.

replies.body: I cant even play now, I get 1-3 sec lag delays. My latency is fine, my FPS is fine, yet theres unexplainable lag.

im having the exact same issue so stupid its happening on all the maps for me.  against summoners or bots it doesnt matter it still gives me atleast a 3 second delay. it only lags when i go near the champions not so much the minions atleast that i know of

Yeah, I mean sure it's a beta but why implement it into Teambuilder for regular people to play if its going to be full of bugs. I'd rather wait another month with it in testing and play on the old "working rift" and have the complete and functioning new rift come out later.
That's literally the point of a beta, to find the bugs.

i have played both on the new rift and the old one and i can say for sure that their  is a problem. when i play on the new rift my fps stays at its normal 22 to 25 ratio witch by my standards is playable. but then after a while like lets say 6 min into the game and i get 2 to 9 fps every time i engage an enemy champion, or when i  get to close to more than 1 allied champion or if we start using our skills at the same time. now while its the only problem ive found it is a big 1 and i hope riot sees this and fixes it as best they can. i understand that some people have to meet the standard requirements to play league but at the same time people have met these requirements and its unfair for something as an  update to the rift changes that. especially when we where promised that we wouldn't have to make any big changes to or software hardware etc. pleas riot fix this problem.
beta is over and this shit is still going on. RIOT DO SOMETHING  DAMIT
I'm still having these unexplainable "graphic lag spikes" and it really pisses me off... I really hope they fix all this or just bring the old Summoner's back.
me to this makes me SO ANGRY. i used to get around 60 frames in team fights now i only get 10-20 frames due to the new rift. this ruins my matches and all the fun pls fix this riot.
That probably is the overload of the servers. In BR everytime we have an update tehre is lag or even packet loos ( minions freaking ou 3 seg delay).
I actually prefer the old summoners rift map, at least i could play without lag in it. Riot should really give players the option to play in either the new or the old map, since the new is Beta.

PLEASE TELL ME THEY WILL FIX THE LAG ONCE NEW SR IS OUT OF BETA, because if not then I wont be able to play this game anymore... if it aint broke dont fix it. Personally I think new map looks cool but if you take away the accessibility, then your going to lose more gamers then attract. I tried the new summoners rift and it was completely impossible to move or play. I have about 35 FPS on old map and I go to 8 on new map... Dont push out your fan base by making your game unaccessible. LOOKS COOL BUT DOESNT WORK.
Exactly the same here Now that the new rift is on all queues, I am fearing the end of league of legends, and the Beginning of LAG of legends.

I am having the same problem. I dont have a crazy high tech computer, but it worked perfectly fine with the old rift. Ever since the update my ffs has been at highest 7 or 8 when i get near another champ. I love league and have been wanting to play, but the game right now is unplayable. I have been waiting for an update to at least a recognition of the lag problem and nothing so far. Please fix, I'd love to be able to play.
I'm having the same problem as k10omega, whenever i go to fight i have 7 fps at the most. But when i first spawn in the game i get up to 35 fps which is amazing for me. Riot please fix!
Same here.  It's not even playable.  My computer has the latest and greatest everything and all my other games work great.  The game has become unplayable.
